article_node.title: IBD Smart NYSE + Nasdaq Tables -- Aug 15, 2025
article_node.summary: The article explains how IBD rates stocks across 33 industry sectors using a composite score that combines EPS growth, relative strength, industry group strength, SMR (sales, profit, ROE), and accumulation/distribution metrics. Each rating ranges from 1 to 99 or A–E, with higher numbers indicating stronger performance. The piece also details visual cues such as color-coded stock names, 52‑week high indicators, and volume change highlights to help investors quickly identify top performers.
